ai-patthana23.26:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
ai-patthana23.26:0.3_0: he struck the box and the following.
ai-patthana23.26:1.1_0: Nor should you give up what is unskillful and doesn’t develop the skillful. Nor should they give up cause or reasons.
ai-patthana23.26:2.1_0: Not seeing, unskillful qualities should be given up by seeing.
